channel.title: Fox v4.5 - Final release;
channel.description:
*sigh*, nobody takes the time to search peoples backgrounds.
[b]I am - [u]Kastro[/u](Rune server) [u]Jeba[/u](Silab) [u]`jeba[/u](Mopar) [u]Firehawk Fox[/u](My own server) [u]1337Gbz [/u](RSBOT).[/b]
I decided I'm done with 317s - switched to Hyperion #459. I figured I'd let this community have my release. (this is outdated by a few months). I personally (by myself) built this up from an out-dated piece of shit, to something that can be hosted. Of course; with a little work, packaging, packet handling and maybe an event manager added you'd probably do a lot better.
As all of my releases of this keep ending up with people showing interest, [S]I'll keep working on it until I decide I want to move to Hyperion or turn another under-rated server into something which can be hosted and played for fun.[/S]
Alright, this version's received some heavy work, I downgraded a little from what I was doing with the equipment as it was fairly pointless.
Information:
Base: wLv3 Economy: started, fairly medium. Customs: No Client required?: Any other than MoparScape. Combat system: Basic WinterLove (I may of released correct range max hits in this version, IDK) Features: Stuff in updates log. Minigames: None, I removed Figment's pathetic P.Czar Barrows. Clue-scrolls: Yes, I plan to abandon my current clues and turn them into random things rather than story lines.
I love pasting this:
As there's still a bunch of morons who use Czars and Allstar base, they won't complain about the combat. This server is intended to be adventure-based meaning you DO NOT HAVE A FUCKING SKILLING AREA. You must walk around the server to gain items and go places.
Recent-ish updates: [CODE]Enchants re-written. Superheat re-written, should be near flawless. EXP multiples are added (I set everything to RS exp and X1) Some combat bugs fixed Arrows delete when fired. TeleTabs removed. Agility removed. High amount of other things which aren't noticed in-game re-written.[/CODE]
Old updates: [CODE]Updates: Doors added on tut.isle Shops added, soon to be 100% done NPC Drops started thanks to Jeddac Agility base added (pic coming soon) Camelot tele added. Teletabs started, models added to the client Glory added, soon ring of duel. all of Varrocks shops are 100% runescape Magic exp on the teleports X by 12 now Arrows now show the exact amount that you are wielding, beforehand it only displayed the item's ID, before that it showed "190" Wildy levels being worked on right now Ardoungne teleport added Added 100% Climbing boots from Tenzing, same place as RuneScape. Teletabs finished. Teleports being a bit nerfed so you dont glitch when in combat Food 100% up until 377 food, jublys and monkfish included. Fishing started. Clues also started, very basic; but effective. Potions being re-done. Added agility shortcuts to some areas, just need to add some emotes. Arrows will delete on use when I compile next. Farming base made: probably exactly like delta's, very basic use item on object, show emote and give an item. Adding poison. Some npcs added, npc drops done. Magic should be able to use staffs, combo runes(steam, mud, ect) and basic runes if magic is handled in client.java (there's no .cfg Wink) Wildy is now ONLY in the wilderness, I'm pretty sure i got 100% of the wildy areas covered. levels still dont work Enchant spells work now, 95%, only thing missing is the GFX and onyx's magic. The exp is handled by ServerCP. Gem crafting added, correct levels and emotes; only thing missing is onyx cut. Adding amulet crafting to go with the enchant. Doors to alkharid and Varrock Hillgiants require correct items and sendmessage. Potions no longer give 137 in each stat, regulars give 111 and supers give 117, pic being uploaded. For some reason it doesn't matter which clue you're doing it will delete all previous scrolls you might of used. Clue scrolls no longer delete previous scrolls. Wc speeds put in ServerCP to adjust economy. Mining also in ServerCP. Arrow handler is now in ServerCP to take out the dropping if the duping shits me. Potions are being worked on and handled by ServerCP. Weapon poisoning by means of poison>items is started. So far DD (clean) has all its poisons. Coal job added. Karamja Banana Plantation added. Door to Hill Giants requires key. 10GP toll added to Al-Kharid. Added most equipment requirement levels Potions are being worked on and handled by ServerCP. Coal job added. Karamja Banana Plantation added. Crystal Key added Chest for the Crystal Key made so you need at least 30 Agility to access it. Sweets heal HP. Sweets now stack. Fixed the combat level glitch, max level is no longer zero . Clues re-written. Silk stalls added. Superheat uses an array for castOnItem Basic Dialogue added to skills/requirements. Item requirements changed to an array so I can be sure every item I add has correct requirements. (Unfinished) <-- this may be a little pointless to some, you can roll it back with this thread: http://www.google.org/showthread.php?t=190762 Some in-game debugs added. [/CODE]
Image: http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/6471/idealul.png
-Downloads Server: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=0J68YYIS http://www.2shared.com/file/10529793...3_Fox_v45.html
Client: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=MST48J2J
Credits: [CODE]`Jeba - Why not? winterLove - Base Jeddac - (drops) (Anthony) - (Packets) 2012 (2pac) - (I learned switch-statements from one of his posts.) Colby_ - (Helped with a part of my SuperHeat) S Quare Quxx - (Taught me timers) Aeterna - (Helped me with a lot of things, corrected multiple things which I posted for oppinions.) Rs2o - (Normal arrays) BreakPown (Delta) - (Looked at his servers code to learn how some stuff was done, without looking I'd probably of not discovered timers) Webber - (I used his client, without it i'd probably be still figuring out object ID's- or using SilabSoft.) Whoever released the DEOB - (saved me from Webbers', I now debug ingame) Ian (Not Core) - (His work on wL is a good Guideline)[/CODE]
If anyone around here says I leeched, you honestly need to stab yourself until you die. Rate me, hate me. This is outdated by far. Off to Hyperion now.

item.title: Fox v4.5 - Final release;
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

Old stuff; but aint spoke to you in months mate- cut the bs kids, no leech here- i wrote the drops using his format for this, now gtfo if you’re going to continue with the accusations LOL.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @IceTICKER IceTICKER
item.description:
@IceTICKER wrote:

JlStepper:

This isn’t you work. This was posted on RServer. You were able to copy and paste the text but not the pictures. Fail.

Raped Son!.

item.title: Fox v4.5 - Final release;
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

JlStepper:

This isn’t you work. This was posted on RServer. You were able to copy and paste the text but not the pictures. Fail.

It is my work, I’ll upload two pictures to prove exactly who I am.

EDIT: one picture, name change doesn’t show my original username.

http://img710.imageshack.us/i/99630365.png/

Next we have a download which is out-dated by far, back when I believed this was a Czar:
You appear to of posted here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,403030.0/topicseen.html

Now, you little anal dwelling butt-monkey. Take a look at my original Development thread from when I first started programming:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

All my progress up until 4.5 has been small, since I released 4.5 - I stopped releasing because nobody will stop using Delta (I was trying to give people options for good economys ect). I was going to host but came across some issues; now I moved onto Hyperion for a #459 revision.

If anybody still has doubts of who I am, you go to R-S and you may PM me personally.

Read full topic

item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

sigh, nobody takes the time to search peoples backgrounds.

I am -
Kastro(Rune server)
[u]Jeba/u
[u]`jeba/u
Firehawk Fox(My own server)
[u]1337Gbz /u.

I decided I’m done with 317s - switched to Hyperion #459. I figured I’d let this community have my release. (this is outdated by a few months). I personally (by myself) built this up from an out-dated piece of shit, to something that can be hosted. Of course; with a little work, packaging, packet handling and maybe an event manager added you’d probably do a lot better.

As all of my releases of this keep ending up with people showing interest, I’ll keep working on it until I decide I want to move to Hyperion or turn another under-rated server into something which can be hosted and played for fun.

Alright, this version’s received some heavy work, I downgraded a little from what I was doing with the equipment as it was fairly pointless.

Information:

Base: wLv3
Economy: started, fairly medium.
Customs: No
Client required?: Any other than MoparScape.
Combat system: Basic WinterLove (I may of released correct range max hits in this version, IDK)
Features: Stuff in updates log.
Minigames: None, I removed Figment’s pathetic P.Czar Barrows.
Clue-scrolls: Yes, I plan to abandon my current clues and turn them into random things rather than story lines.

I love pasting this:

As there’s still a bunch of morons who use Czars and Allstar base, they won’t complain about the combat. This server is intended to be adventure-based meaning you DO NOT HAVE A FUCKING SKILLING AREA. You must walk around the server to gain items and go places.

Recent-ish updates:

Enchants re-written. Superheat re-written, should be near flawless. EXP multiples are added (I set everything to RS exp and X1) Some combat bugs fixed Arrows delete when fired. TeleTabs removed. Agility removed. High amount of other things which aren't noticed in-game re-written.

Old updates:

Updates: Doors added on tut.isle Shops added, soon to be 100% done NPC Drops started thanks to Jeddac Agility base added (pic coming soon) Camelot tele added. Teletabs started, models added to the client Glory added, soon ring of duel. all of Varrocks shops are 100% runescape Magic exp on the teleports X by 12 now Arrows now show the exact amount that you are wielding, beforehand it only displayed the item's ID, before that it showed "190" Wildy levels being worked on right now Ardoungne teleport added Added 100% Climbing boots from Tenzing, same place as RuneScape. Teletabs finished. Teleports being a bit nerfed so you dont glitch when in combat Food 100% up until 377 food, jublys and monkfish included. Fishing started. Clues also started, very basic; but effective. Potions being re-done. Added agility shortcuts to some areas, just need to add some emotes. Arrows will delete on use when I compile next. Farming base made: probably exactly like delta's, very basic use item on object, show emote and give an item. Adding poison. Some npcs added, npc drops done. Magic should be able to use staffs, combo runes(steam, mud, ect) and basic runes if magic is handled in client.java (there's no .cfg Wink) Wildy is now ONLY in the wilderness, I'm pretty sure i got 100% of the wildy areas covered. levels still dont work Enchant spells work now, 95%, only thing missing is the GFX and onyx's magic. The exp is handled by ServerCP. Gem crafting added, correct levels and emotes; only thing missing is onyx cut. Adding amulet crafting to go with the enchant. Doors to alkharid and Varrock Hillgiants require correct items and sendmessage. Potions no longer give 137 in each stat, regulars give 111 and supers give 117, pic being uploaded. For some reason it doesn't matter which clue you're doing it will delete all previous scrolls you might of used. Clue scrolls no longer delete previous scrolls. Wc speeds put in ServerCP to adjust economy. Mining also in ServerCP. Arrow handler is now in ServerCP to take out the dropping if the duping shits me. Potions are being worked on and handled by ServerCP. Weapon poisoning by means of poison>items is started. So far DD (clean) has all its poisons. Coal job added. Karamja Banana Plantation added. Door to Hill Giants requires key. 10GP toll added to Al-Kharid. Added most equipment requirement levels Potions are being worked on and handled by ServerCP. Coal job added. Karamja Banana Plantation added. Crystal Key added Chest for the Crystal Key made so you need at least 30 Agility to access it. Sweets heal HP. Sweets now stack. Fixed the combat level glitch, max level is no longer zero . Clues re-written. Silk stalls added. Superheat uses an array for castOnItem Basic Dialogue added to skills/requirements. Item requirements changed to an array so I can be sure every item I add has correct requirements. (Unfinished) <-- this may be a little pointless to some, you can roll it back with this thread: http://www.google.org/showthread.php?t=190762 Some in-game debugs added.

Image: http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/6471/idealul.png

-Downloads

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=0J68YYIS
http://www.2shared.com/file/10529793...3_Fox_v45.html

http://www.megaupload.com/?d=MST48J2J

Credits:

`Jeba - Why not? winterLove - Base Jeddac - (drops) (Anthony) - (Packets) 2012 (2pac) - (I learned switch-statements from one of his posts.) Colby_ - (Helped with a part of my SuperHeat) S Quare Quxx - (Taught me timers) Aeterna - (Helped me with a lot of things, corrected multiple things which I posted for oppinions.) Rs2o - (Normal arrays) BreakPown (Delta) - (Looked at his servers code to learn how some stuff was done, without looking I'd probably of not discovered timers) Webber - (I used his client, without it i'd probably be still figuring out object ID's- or using SilabSoft.) Whoever released the DEOB - (saved me from Webbers', I now debug ingame) Ian (Not Core) - (His work on wL is a good Guideline)

If anyone around here says I leeched, you honestly need to stab yourself until you die. Rate me, hate me. This is outdated by far. Off to Hyperion now.
